title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 January 2013 - XWiki

21:01 <joschi> has joined #xwiki  
21:08 <joschi> hi! I'm trying to setup XWiki 4.4 with the Social Login Application (http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Social+Login+Application). In the end it should be possible to login using a Google OpenID account  
21:08 <joschi> After installing the extension and following the instructions I get the following error message in my Tomcat logs: https://gist.github.com/18b19fa99918075d2b68  
21:08 <joschi> The extension has been installed using XWiki's extension manager and is shown on the "Extension Manager" -> "Installed extensions" site.  
21:08 <joschi> Any ideas why it can't load the classes.  
21:14 <polx> I think I saw an error reported about the extension manager not able to load embedded jars.  
21:15 <polx> Check the mailing-list archive (xwiki-devs I think).  
21:21 <joschi> polx: ok, I'll see if I find it. Do you remember if this was only a problem with xwiki 4.4 or if older versions (e. g. 4.3) also had this bug?  
21:25 <polx> I think 4.4 only  
22:00 <joschi> polx: I've tried with XWiki 4.3.1 now but I get the same error  
22:07 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
22:56 <abusenius> has quit
